Trump's control panel: no dials, sliders. Apparently nothing to prevent those switches flipping back and forth rapidly when shaken.
Gauges on Trump's control panel have 2 increments: Worst Ever and Best Ever. Control panel is a switch, either Incoherently Hate/Love
